titleStmt.title: James A. Edwards to P. Swigert
CWG7941

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Office Commercial Bank of Kenty
Harrodsburg April 23. 1863.
P Swigert Esq Prest
Dear Sir

A few weeks since T P Mitchell requsted Governor Robinson (by letter) to commission Z. P. McBrayer. of this city Notary Public for Mercer County. I suppose the Governor in the press of business has neglected to do So. will you do me the favour to see the Governor and have the commission forwarded

Very Respectfully
Jas A Edwards Cas

Mercer Co
Notary
Z. P. McBrayer
App. Apr 25. 1863
